title: Object - Stock Class Conversion Ratio Adjustment Transaction
description: Records a change in the conversion ratio adjustment of a stock class (typically due to anti-dilution protection / repricing due to a down-round) by specifying a new RATIO_CONVERSION mechanism, with updated price, ratio, and rounding method. The actual determination of the new conversion ratio / conversion price is calculated outside of OCF, so the specific mechanism - e.g. broad-based weighted-average anti-dilution protection vs. full ratchet anti-dilution protection.

new_ratio_conversion_mechanism.description: New conversion ratio mechanism describing new conversion price and conversion ratio in effect following a repricing - based on original issue price to new conversion price (provided in this transaction). For 2-for-1 split the numerator of the ratio is 2 and the denominator is 1.
